info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 9:45AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northeastern Geauga...Lake and west central Ashtabula Counties Until 1100 AM EST.... At 945 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from 20 miles north of Perry to 8 miles north of Madison to 6 miles south of Geneva, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Painesville, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Mentor, Geneva, Madison, Perry, Kirtland, Montville, Hartsgrove, North Perry, Thompson, Kirtland Hills, Rock Creek, Grand River and North Madison. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 315, 326, 331, and 332.
